title: 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization
text:
Updated: 12:25 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 | Posted: 12:25 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015 5 things to know about Lamar Odom's hospitalization Related View Larger Marcio Jose Sanchez / AP This Jan. 2, 2013, file photo shows Los Angeles Clippers' Lamar Odom (7) in action against the Golden State Warriors during an NBA basketball game in Oakland, Calif. By Cox Media Group National Content Desk LAS VEGAS — 
Former NBA player Lamar Odom, ex-husband of reality TV star Khloe Kardashian, was hospitalized in Nevada on Tuesday night after two women found him unconscious at a legal brothel, The Associated Press reports . 
Here's what we know so far: 
>> PHOTOS: Lamar Odom fighting for his life 
1. Odom reportedly arrived at Love Ranch on Saturday. Dennis Hof, the brothel's owner, told the AP that staffers brought Odom there because he "wanted to get away, have a good time and relax." On Tuesday, two women checked on him in his room, where he was unconscious. 
"We called 911, and the 911 told my staff what to do: turn him over on his left side," Hof told NBC News . "There was this terrible foaming stuff coming out of him." 
Odom was taken to Desert View Hospital in Pahrump, then transported to Las Vegas' Sunrise Hospital. 
>> RELATED: Lamar Odom found unconscious at Nevada brothel​ 
2. Odom reportedly told employees that he had taken cocaine before his arrival at the ranch, the AP reports . Hof said Odom did not appear to be taking any illegal drugs at the brothel, but he was seen drinking Cognac and taking "herbal Viagra." 
"He was taking a lot of it," Hof told NBC News . 
Officials are testing a blood sample to see whether any drugs were in Odom's system, according to the AP . 
3. The Rev. Jesse Jackson, who visited Odom at the hospital Wednesday, said Odom's condition was improving. "Apparently, from what the doctor said, he was much better off today than yesterday," Jackson told the AP . "He at least has some responsiveness now. He's got tubes in him now, but we felt inspired by his presence." 
>> Read more trending stories 
4. Kardashian and Odom's childhood friends reportedly have been at Odom's bedside at the hospital. According to Fox Sports , Kobe Bryant also reportedly left the Los Angeles Lakers' preseason game early Tuesday to visit Odom. The official reason given for Bryant's departure was a leg contusion, or a bruise, but he actually left the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Vegas to see his former teammate, the outlet said. Joe Odom, Odom's "once-estranged father," and Jackson also went to the hospital, the AP reports . 
5. Several celebrities and athletes are offering well-wishes online. "On my knees praying ... please God let him pull thru," Miami Heat star Dwyane Wade tweeted . I can't help but to be up right now... THINKING about my ex teammate/ friend LO.. On my knees praying...please God let him pull thru..
